title: Dashboard
description: Dashboard, built with React, features interactive charts, graphs, and data visualization tools for effective monitoring and analysis.

title: TODO List
description: Todo List application using React, with Toastify integrated for displaying notifications. Features task management with add, edit, delete, and mark as complete functionality.

title: Banking Website
description: Hoobank is a banking application that provides a user-friendly interface. Features modern design, responsive layout, and simulated banking functionality.

title: QuizMaster
description: QuizMaster is a modern and interactive frontend-only quiz application built with React. It features a level-based quiz system (Easy, Medium, Hard), dynamic questions, real-time feedback, and a performance history tracker using localStorage. Upon successful completion, users are awarded a professionally designed certificate which can be downloaded. The app includes a smooth UI/UX with animated transitions, light/dark theme toggle, progress bar, result review, and category-wise scoring analysis — all without using any backend.

title: Rapid Typing Test
description: A frontend-only typing speed test application built with React. Tracks typing speed (WPM), accuracy, and provides a digital certificate on successful completion. Includes auto-level progression (Easy → Medium → Hard), visual progress tracking, and social sharing. No backend required.

title: MERN Auth
description: A secure and full-featured authentication system built with the MERN stack. It includes Login, Signup, Forgot Password, and a protected Dashboard with full CRUD operations. Designed with a clean light theme and integrated with JWT authentication and bcrypt encryption for security.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A responsive weather application built using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fetches real-time weather data from an external API. Displays temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions based on user location or city search. Clean UI with responsive design.
